name: All Work No Dice
description:
tl;dr; Click and drag workers into card slots. Some cards need dice as inputs. Collect dice to complete each tier. Tier 4 is the final tier.

Rate the Game

Made for the GMTK 2022 Jam themed "Roll of the Dice".  I created this game by myself with some ideas for my Twitch chat. I loosely based this game of off the game Stack Lands as I had just seen Day9 play it earlier this week.  I made this game live on twitch (https://www.twitch.tv/aarimous).

How To Play:

  1. “Work Cards” always need a worker.  Some might need dice (like the river water). *You can move cards around by clicking and dragging
  2. Dice represent resource: 
    1. Red = Food
    2. Blue = Water
    3. Gray = Materials 
    4.  Green = Any Type
  3. Fill the goals for each tier to win. 
    1. Completing a tier gives you more work cards
  4. You can Click and drag workers to assign them to “Work Cards”
  5. Workers get hungry, so you will need to feed them Food Dice (by dropping a red dice on the worker) otherwise they will slow down. Overly full workers will also work slowly
